评论详情: Just what i was looking for! They are like as if barefoot 💖
Returned the single sandal that was received so can't review the product
I have neuropathy and these are spectacular to walk around in my garden

I tried several barefoot sandals and this is by far my fave! I've been using them for about 5 months. Looks great on foot, a little more cushion than others which is good for hiking concrete trails or going over rocks, cleans up easily. I use them for everything from running errands, hiking, water activities, weight training, evening neighborhood walks, and yard work. Excellent fit that can be adjusted to your foot in a few different ways. I like them so well I recently purchased a pair for several of my siblings/nieces/nephews for Christmas 2024. Highly recommend!

I’m hoping this was a fluke and the replacement will hold up, because the first run in these sandals the strap between toes came loose after just 2.5miles! Very disappointed for the price. My old pair of DIY Xero sandals lasted thousands of miles.

Do not recommend for beginner barefoot shie wearers, tripped over these and they caused heel pain. If you are going to buy them I recommend sizing down. They are not beginner barefoot shoes and the footbed is very wide toes to heels nor a match for my wide in the front narrow in the heels feet.
Great barefoot sandal
I lost these at a water park and was so sad until we were able to get them the next day at lost and found! They have become my every day shoe lifeline for comfort.

评论概述: Absolutely terrible design plastic digs into you!
评论详情: Not worth the money!  Terrible design! Plastic digs into your feet in several places!! Feel cheap! Makes your feet sweat!! Maybe 3 $ in materials back strap won’t stay on heal!  They also squeak on most floors!!  I have nothing good to say about them’

Once you get them adjusted they are great. At first they were floppy in the front. One side rubs a little on the outside of foot near the ankle. But not bad enough to be bothersome. They are very lightweight which is strange feels like you aren't wearing anything. Hahaha. I got them on sale. They seem sturdy. And they were kinda easy to adjust. And I love how they look.  More cushion then I thought therw would be as well so they are very comfortable.  I loke that they have a heel cup. I think a chubby foot wouldn't work so well with the heel cup though. All in all they are a great sandal. Definitely a keeper with some adjustments made but they are made to be adjustable so that's awesome!! 👌

The cons outweigh the pros. This was my first time buying barefoot shoes, and I will say it took my ankle and leg muscles a minute to adjust at first so if you’re starting out I definitely don’t recommend walking long distances. These shoes are extremely flexible, and it causes me to trip if I’m walking too fast. They are also very loud when you walk. I do love the look of them and they are versatile and go with whatever I have on and seem to be holding up well. Overall not the worst but also not the best.

评论概述: Nail salon flips flops, but with a rope!
评论详情: These are just maybe a step above the nail salon flip flops they give for free..... but these come with a ROPE!  A very uncomfortable rope that I couldn't get to adjust to comfort.  Very expensive for what they are.  Immediately returned!

I love these sandals! They are my go-to pair now over my Birkenstocks. I love that I can wear them on wet days and not worry since they're not leather. I get complimented on them often as well, and women have asked me where I got them/what brand they are. Would 10/10 recommend you buy.

These fit to standard size. I wear a 7.5-8 in most shoes. Ordered these in an 8 and the fit perfectly. I love there's multiple ways to adjust the fit. My left foot gives me all kinds of issues and it took me some time to find the correct adjustment while the right sandal was perfectly adjusted right out of the package. As my first pair of barefoot I have been able to wear these all day with no break in, on both soft and hard surfaces.

Ok so I am very new to "barefoot" shoes, but am always open to what people consider to be "better for your [feet]", with that said, I was NOT expecting them to be this comfortable! They're so soft! I can walk in these all day long! I literally don't need to purchase another sandal this summer. These are perfect.

I bought a pair of these about 10 years ago (I can’t remember the actual date) and didn’t like them because I kept falling out of them. Fast forward to my recent purchase and I cannot even begin to express how much better they are!! I wore these for a week on a rafting trip and they never fell off once. They are incredibly comfortable and they look great. I am so impressed by these that I bought another pair in a different color. These are my new go to shoes for the summer - LOVE THEM!!!
Love these sandals. They are comfortable and I love the adjustable straps. They are a good quality and have sturdy straps and look nice as well.
Love! I recommend sizing down if you have a narrow foot. Otherwise super comfortable and feel high quality!

I was looking for ultralight shoes to carry for camp backpacking. I ordered these because the weight listed in the description said a women’s size 7 was 4.4 ounces. I ordered a women’s size 8 and they weigh 9.75 ounces, which is heavier than my vinyl Birkenstocks by 2 ounces. They must be listing each shoe individually for weight, which seems deceptive. Just be aware if you’re looking for shoes like this to lighten your pack weight, they are double the weight listed.

I actually bought these directly from the brand instead of Amazon, but I am pretty satisfied with these. If you live in a hot place like Florida, these bring you right back to your days of wearing flip flops, but in a totally different way. I really love how simple they are. The only thing I wished is that you could tighten them a bit more, which would feel more secure to me, but otherwise no problems. However, if you haven't worn flat shoes or sandals for a while, be prepared. I usually wear boots and wearing these put a bit of strain on my ankle since I haven't worn anything like them in a long time. Really pleased with them and might be ordering another pair - would love to see them come in a lot more color combos or designs, with the option to make them tighter.

I really didn’t think I would like these. I’ve had barefoot shoes in the past and loved them until they fell apart.  With age and adulthood I conformed to “appropriate “ shoes and my feet always hurt!  I’m now going back to happy feet, and have had sticker shock at the prices of “barefoot” shoes. After trying these on and walking around and lots of adjustments, I get it.  These are really great sandals!  My feet are free and happy, and the design of the shoe allows you to adjust to your comfort and security needs.  Totally worth the price.

Product order Nov 9, started using these in early December. Now the sandal is broken. No additional grommets included to fix the sandal.  Very expensive product with less than 3 months usage! Big fan of minimalist shoes but will not be coming back to this product.

I cannot stand not having shoes on in the water but also don’t love the clunky look of full water shoes I’d wear kayaking/adventuring when we travel to nicer pools & beaches. These worked wonderfully because the thin minimal footprint looked “nice” enough but I could also wear them right into the pool / lazy river or beach at the resort! They slip on quickly so I could keep up with my kids as well.They dried super fast and were easy to throw in my luggage! Taking off one star because once they were adjusted the plastic part of the shoe clinks on the ground. I had to wrap them and tuck them to prevent that from happening. They also seem a bit overpriced but time will tell regarding the quality. As of now, I’m very pleased and will look out for sales to grab another pair!
came w straps basically already set. I had no problems getting the right strap adjustment quickly. Stays on foot well. Love the groundfeel. Very flexible.

I got these for my daughter who is a swimmer. She loves them. They fit her extra wide feet perfectly and on the pool deck she said they have better traction than Crocs. She also says they are more comfortable. She loves how they are lightweight and move in sync with her feet, like they are one.

评论概述: No half sizes, so choose wisely!
评论详情: I have a 7.5 - 8 size foot in women’s.  Seeing that these were whole sizes, I ventured into the territory of ordering a size seven and eight to compare the fit.  The size 7 ended up being close to perfect.  The eights were a bit too loose with more of the laces hanging a bit when adjusted correctly for my feet.  I walked around a bit in both to test them, and the size 8 offered a bit less control; I also felt a bit of flopping during the trial run.  The size 7 fits my foot almost exactly with a little room to tighten or loosen the laces for more or less control with no flopping in either setting for me.  Soooo…. I think I’m going to send the 8 back and keep the 7… much to my surprise :) These are just great shoes!  I’m excited to wear them everywhere this summer :) Many thanks to Amazon for shipping and to Xero Shoes for the quality product!  ♥️ Hope the pictures help anyone trying to decide what would work best :)

评论概述: The Closest Thing to Being Barefoot without Being Barefoot
评论详情: I’ve added pictures to show the difference between an 8 and a 7.  I’m a solid 8 in women’s shoes and the photo on the left is an 8.  I returned those as they were about 1” too long.  I then ordered the 7 and you can see it is the perfect fit.  I’ve added side views of the 7 so you can see where everything hits on the feet.I’m a long wearer of bedrock sandals and those will be my go-to for hiking, but the Xero’s are going to be my everything else shoe.  I may even buy a second pair to use as my “fashion” pair as I read in  one of the reviews a person who changes out the laces with different colors and tying styles.
Me encantaron. Super cómodas, excelente calidad. Cumplieron con todas mis expectativas.

评论概述: Not as fantastic as I had hoped.
评论详情: I was expecting a much more comfortable and better fitting shoe this money. It’s kind of floppy and does not get any support. It is truly a barefoot to you if you are looking for that.

These minimalist barefoot sandals are very high quality. They are extremely comfortable, conformed easily to my feet, and (the proper size) did not "flop" around when I walked. This is the second size I purchased because originally I thought I should be a size 9 as I was borderline for the size range. That was a bad choice for this type of sandal. If you are borderline on sizes, I'd go for the smaller one that your measurements should fit into. If you go for the larger one in your size range the front will be too long and will catch on the floor when you walk. When I bought the size 8 it fit perfectly and the front part of the sandal no longer caught on the floor as I walked. And it was much more comfortable fur to the better fit!  If yours are uncomfortably loose, you may have to big of a size.

评论概述: Comfortable but the straps are a pain
评论详情: This shoe is a good barefoot-style shoe with a thin, flexible sole. I enjoy that. When the straps are fitted correctly, the shoe is comfortable to wear all day (I wore it through an amusement park for 2 days and they were great). BUT getting the straps adjusted is a pain. They design of the shoe means that if they need adjusted or start to loosen as I'm walking, I have to take them off and wiggle the strap through the loop on the side and then tighten or loosen. If they are a little too loose, the front toe tends to be floppy and catch when you are walking. Also, the ends to the strap then dangle and I found I have to tuck them into the strap.

评论概述: LOVE these. They feel like you are walking on air
评论详情: This is my third pair of XERO shoes. But I usually get workout and running shoes. I never thought I would like such a simple flip flop. But I do. they feel better than flip flops, it feels Like I am walking on air. I highly recommend. Size fitted to right size. thank you!
Most comfortable sandals I own!!
This is my first pair of minimalist sandals after transitioning to barefoot shoes and they lived up to the hype! So comfy and in my opinion flattering. Thank you! I am a 9.5 so I went up to the 10.

评论概述: Good for when you need water shoes
评论详情: They work for their purpose. Provide some protection from stuff on the ground while climbing around waterfalls, wading in creeks. Not easy to walk through woods or over a dry creek bed in though.

This is my second pair of Aqua Cloud sandals.  The first pair were SO comfortable that I ordered another pair in a different color.  My feet have never been stronger than they are now after wearing minimalist sandals.  I have a VERY HIGH arch, and have experienced ZERO problems wearing sandals with no arch support.  If anything, it has allowed my feet the freedom to do what they were designed to do, and my feet are so much better off because of it.

评论概述: Awesome sandals, pack small and fit great
评论详情: Sizing maybe runs a bit big. I normally wear 40 or 41, sometimes 42 but depends on the brand.  Good flat grippy sole, great adjustability in the straps. Exactly what I was looking for

评论概述: Great for beach, but not for vigorous walking
评论详情: These sandals are great.  The sole is thin and flexible, so it really feels like you are walking barefoot.  I purchased them, because last year I stepped on a bee and was stung while walking barefoot on the beach.  I figured this would protect me from such an occurrence happening again.  While walking casually on the beach, they are fine.  It's great to walk in the water with them.  However, while doing my fitness walk today, I formed blisters around the edges of my heels.  The part between the toes is also a little uncomfortable if you are walking quickly, because your foot tends to move forward a bit, pushing it into your skin between the toes.  Anyway, I still recommend these sandals, just not for any fast walking.

评论概述: I have come to dislike these
评论详情: No adjustment makes these comfortable. They either slip at the heel or are too tight at the toe. The extra rope allowing for the adjusting is awkward and ugly. I have been trying to get used to these for two weeks. I am an avid Vibram wearer and have been for a decade, but these make my soles hurt. pros: they are totally rubber and nylon rope, so fairly impervious to water and dry quickly. As I am using them for dog walking, this is a handy trait. Closer to a size 9 than 8 and ordered an 8. I’m a UK/vibram size 40. If I hadn’t, there would’ve been a lot of rubber hanging off the top and back of the shoe. As it was, the length fit me with a centimeter or so to spare. Still, I am likely to toss these.

On a try before you buy. I normally wear a 7, but their website says they run large and they definitely do. A size 6 fits perfectly. I've only been wearing barefoot shoes for a little over a month and I wore birks before then so my feet are pretty spread, but not at all like the photos you see of real toe spread. I'm not sure these would be wide enough for real spread. My feet fill them out fully. I have very sensitive toes, apparently, bc I normally can't wear thong sandals, but the cording of these, rather than a plastic shaft make them really comfortable. Definitely keeping these. The blue is prettier than I thought it would be. I was going to try the black sandals, but they weren't available in a 6, so I got these and I actually like the colors
These are my first pair of minimal shoes.  They have been all I have worn for the past week since I received them.  They fit true to size for me.  Super flexible, love the freedom.

评论概述: Just what I've been looking for
评论详情: Since Teva stopped making the Zilch sandals I've been looking for something similar. These are so comfortable!  If you like going barefoot these are the next best thing!
the new everywhere shoe
I didn’t like these. I couldn’t get them to fit right on my foot. They run wide. I returned them.  I love the idea though.
This are so comfortable. I use them as my recovery Sandle

I've been wearing these nearly daily for the past two months and here's what I've observed. Pros - very adjustable - super lightweight - easy to pack and dries quickly - decent traction on dry surfaces - seem pretty durable - comfortable  Cons - uber slippery on wet asphalt and tile - the toe strap anchor should be further back which causes my foot to slide too far forward to where my toes almost hang off - price seems steep compared to some cheapy flat sandals from Target that I wore daily in the summer months for the last 7 years - can't get them right enough to actual hiking in them (maybe my foot is too thin?)  Overall I'd recommend them, especially if they're on sale. I plan to keep wearing them until they explode as they work well for the office, lunch walks, and travel.
The toggle broke as soon as I got them out of the package to adjust them. Didn’t even get a chance to wear them.

These fit perfectly, easy to adjust. I like that it doesn’t make your feet stink like other man made materials do. Used them on the beach and the sand slid right off and didn’t stick.  Very happy with this purchase. I bought a second pair.
I’m new to barefoot shoes. Loved the flexibility but this was just not enough shoe for me. Felt like a couple of strings attached to an extremely thin rubber sole.

评论概述: They feel like your wearing nothing
评论详情: I was first skeptical but I absolutely love these shoes for so many reasons. Feels like I am barefoot and yet I can go so freely into water walk on rocks etc

评论概述: I love them next time I’ll size down.
评论详情: These are amazing next time I’ll buy them smaller.

I bought the 6. Fit great. My monkey feet hate shoes. I have hyper mobile toes and a narrow heel. Ultimate tiny duck feet. I spent 20 minutes adjusting. So the laces lay flat. The back loop on the right foot was super tight. Adjusting.  A year later, I ditched their laces. The plastic bits are super annoying. I used boot laces. I switch off pretty colors, different lengths and how I tie them.

Ever since spraining my ankle my foot only likes to be barefoot. Since I can’t go through life barefoot I needed to find the next best thing. And THESE are it! It took me about 10 minutes to adjust both of them to fit my feet perfectly. 10 minutes that will pay off until these puppies are falling apart. The sole is absolutely amazing - so flexible and responsive, truly like wearing nothing. And the ankle strap rides low enough that my cranky inner ankle bone isn’t bothered at all, yet it’s very secure on my foot. It’s a completely flat sole, there is no arch support of any kind, which is exactly what my foot needs to be happy. And here’s the kicker…they’re CUTE! I thought the plastic tabs at the ends of the strap would look clunky or feel weird against the back of my foot, but neither is the case, I can’t tell they're there at all. And while it gives my toes plenty of space they’re not so big that they look weird at all. Thank you Xero!

the sole is great..even on rocks but some getting use to and adjusting was necessary...and never quite "got there"...between the toes just was weird on one foot, and the strap on the other just refused to adjust properly. they are comfortable tho but I notice the above every time I wear them. Alas, it is not enough to make me quit wearing. They are nice.

I measured the map cut things the chords and then put them back into the So that they wouldn't look ridiculous because I had to buy a  8 instead of a 7 and a 1/2 so I had a 1/2 an inch sticking out from my heel perand my feet are crooked anyway cause I have scholiosis. So I glued in something to help me but otherwise the thing that holds your thing between your toes if your sensitive it might hurt you I had to put a ring around it of silicone and glue it down with shoe goo.  Otherwise once you get the size right then you're good to go I don't run but I'm gonna at least walk with them but they are harder the soul is hard.

评论概述: So much better than I expected
评论详情: I am a newbie to healthy footware like this - and this turned out to be a fantastic pair to start with. Funny story- first order I literally recieved ONE shoe. They resent a new pair quickly.  The color of these is great and the fit is customizable with the adjustments on the straps. The flex is incredible and I've been wearing them non stop since the day I got them (well, the PAIR of them) and have had no adjustment time. To be fair, I spend a lot of time barefoot, but not in my shopping, driving and other things outside the property. I had yoga mat style shoes for years that were flexible and quite cushiony. When those wore out, I stuck with some basic flipflops - horrible for foot health I know. So these were a welcome surprise as how wonderful they felt from the start. I can comfortably wear my toe spacers in them when I want as well.  The sole is flexible, and thin. There is a small amount of cushion- very small. They are also thin enough that the "goat-head" seed thorns in the area (as they are called) can go through, which is just an unpleasant aspect of where we live, not an issue with the shoe and its still worth wearing them.  These are my first Xero shoes and I am prepared to buy others. Definitely recommend!

So far so good! Once the straps are adjusted correctly, they’re very comfortable. I walk about 5-10 miles a day in these and they seem to be holing up really well. I like that they are truly zero drop and very thin, but protective and sturdy enough that road debris can be felt, but isn’t a danger.
These are great sandles that can be adjusted to fit perfectly.

评论概述: Next to nothing on your feet.
评论详情: I ordered these shoes upon the recommendation of my Doctor.  I love them.  They are easy to wear and as I do LOVE to go barefoot, this is the next best thing.

Al poco de comprarlas me rompí el dedo pequeño del pie y ha sido el único calzado que he llevado desde entonces (menos mal que las compré porque si no no hubiera podido salir de casa).  Es como caminar descalzo, suela muy flexible en todas las direcciones y las cuerdas parecen fuertes y que aguantarán tiempo.  Lo malo, el precio, la unión en la zona de los dedos (un poco más estrecha sería más cómoda) y que al ser tan planas y finas si pisas una piedra o cualquier desnivel se te clava hasta el alma.

Utilizo un 36, así que me decidí por el 35 y medio. Al principio las veía perfectas, las uso para todo (playa, pasear,…). Tras un mes de uso, la verdad es que me arrepiento de no haberlas cambiado por una talla más, ya que a veces me molestan un poco entre los dedos. Una pena, pero las recomiendo sin pensarlo, buscando una talla más de la habitual si tienes dudas.

I bought these in January and have been waiting for some warm weather to try them out. I decided to jump right in and wear them on a fairly long dog walk on pavement, track, grass and meadows. They are an absolute pleasure to walk in. The elastic strap is easy to adjust to get the fit perfect and they feel secure on my feet. My foot doesn’t slip off them sideways like with some sandals and there’s no silly little fiddly buckles to do up. I’ve walked in them all week - miles and miles in total - no rubbing, no blisters, no soreness. They will definitely be my go to shoes this summer and I’m looking forward to wearing them on holiday too - they’ll be so easy to pack.
These are so light and comfortable.  Absolutely love them! And there's a 2 year/5000 mile warranty... what's not to like?
These sandals are everything they promise. They are so comfortable, and they look great.
Excellent, lightweight barefoot sandals

I wanted a pair of sandals which were barefoot, came in black and didn't have a cork sole. These seemed to fit the bill, I can keep my cork soled canvas pair for best and use these for everyday.  I do not however reach for these everyday as I find the sole almost too flexible. I know, I know, they're barefoot, they're supposed to be flexible! But I find with these I catch the toe regularly and it feels like it's folding under.  The multi adjustment places are a great feature, although I do find that the knots can apply pressure directly below them after a short while. Makes me want to kick them off to be barefoot as soon as I can!  I also do not feel comfortable driving in them. Whilst they have great traction when on foot, I find them pretty slippy on the pedals.  Overall not a purchase I would make again, though I will persevere. I so wish to visit a barefoot store and to try on in person rather than having to order online!

Comprar esta marca es ir sobre seguro a un calzado de calidad, se ve a simple vista en los materiales. ¿Lo malo? Que pido un 39 y me mandan un 38.5 🤷🏻‍♀️ ¿consecuencia? Devolución, pedir otro número y ver si mandan lo que pides. No entiendo porque, además, si escribes al vendedor no te contesta para darte unas pautas en cm. Además, en su web, van los números por medios (38.5, 39.5...) y aquí venden números enteros, así que no cuadra nada. Es molesto la pérdida de tiempo

I have worn these almost constantly on the warm days.  Barefoot living is definitely my new favourite thing.  My backache has improved along with the various foot and ankle niggles.  Now to find the winter version for the colder days!
Fairly new to bearfoot shoes, but found these very comfortable, even after wearing all day at a music festival. Easy to adjust to fit.

Love these so much. So flat, so thin, so adjustable, so comfortable. I work outside and these are just amazing for the warmer days. They would be perfect for holidays too or to wear out and about, I think they look great and really stylish. I have two pairs already and I'm a xero shoes convert.  Take the plunge into barefoot sandals. You won't regret it!
I find the toggle under the sandal (beneath the thong between toes) digs in uncomfortably when walking.  Not simple to see how/if possible to adjust so disappointing
Unfortunately was send American sizing shoes so didn’t fit .
Brauche diese bei Flussqueerungen in der Amerikanischen Wildniss und beim campieren. Alles passt
